column2: VaSto - Varchi; Storia fiorentina edizione digitale
column3: The VaSto project; developed within the /DH.arc of the University of Bologna; is the result of a collaboration between the University of Bologna; Concordia University in Montreal; and CarisBo. It presents; in an interactive digital environment; the genetic and annotated digital edition of the Storia fiorentina by Benedetto Varchi (1503-1565).
column31: Roma; Accademia Nazionale dei Lincei; Biblioteca (Biblioteca Corsiniana) 39.D.5 (Rossi 395; Cors. 1532)

column3: The Codice Pelavicino Edizione Digitale project created a digital edition of the manuscript using the open-source EVT software; enabling in-depth study without physical consultation.
column31: Sarzana (La Spezia); Archivio Capitolare Lunense-Sarzanense «Codice Pelavicino»

column1: Digital Edition of Aldo Moro's works
column2: Digital Edition of Aldo Moro's works
column3: Critical edition; philologically informed and annotated; of both published and unpublished texts by the statesman; with a historical introduction. Fully accessible online for free and openly available.
column19: Gli anni giovanili (1939-1946); Al ministero degli Esteri e all’opposizione nel partito (giugno 1968 – giugno 1973); Il ritorno al centro-sinistra e la “solidarietà nazionale” (giugno 1973 – maggio 1978)

column3: TEI-XML edition of Il De rebus Siculis carmen (also known as Carmen de motibus Siculis or Liber ad honorem Augusti); utilizing EVT - Edition Visualization Technology
